lyrics:
15 contributorspoltergeist lyricsverse 1
what can i say
i think i had enough
i think you keep playing to play
knowing that i feel sick
cmon just say it
just say you like to play
this game just to drive me wild

chorus
i let you pretend
but you know truth is that
i love you to death
like you love this game

postchorus
this time
theres a common thread

verse 2
and so i sit
and watch you play dumb
id like to see you play with the odds
on your plate instead
come on just say it
just say you like to keep this pace
just to drive me wild
you might also likechorus
i let you pretend
but you know the truth is that
i love you to death
like you love this game

postchorus
that keeps me hanging tight

verse 3
what can i say
i think your heads fucked
go on drive me wild

chorus
this time
theres a constant theme
this time
theres a common thread

postchorus
that keeps me hanging tight
and it tells me somethings right

outro
what can i say
i fuckin had enough
i think you just play what you play
knowing that i feel sick
cmon just say it
just say you like to play this game
cause it drives me wild6embed
